Source.Name: python-configobj
Source.Summary: A simple but powerful config file reader and writer: an ini file round tripper
Source.Description: python-configobj is a simple but powerful config file reader and writer: an ini file round tripper. Its main feature is that it is very easy to use, with a straightforward programmer's interface and a simple syntax for config files. It has lots of other features though.

Update.Comment: Improves performance adds features for validation and fixes some bugs.
Update.Name: Fethican Coşkuner

Update.Comment: - Pickling of ConfigObj instances now supported. - Replaced use of hasattr (which can swallow exceptions) with getattr. - You can now create an empty ConfigObj with a configspec, programmatically set values and then validate. - Added as_list method. - Removed the deprecated istrue, encode and decode methods. - Running test_configobj.py now also runs the doctests in the configobj module.
Update.Name: Fethican Coşkuner
